statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity < 50
SELECT sensor_id, device_id, humidity FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, device_id, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT sensor_id, device_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01'
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity) FROM sensor_data WHERE device_id = 1 GROUP BY device_id
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM sensors
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC
SELECT COUNT(sensor_id) AS Total_Sensors FROM sensors
SELECT sensor_name, location, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE location='Room 1'
SELECT MAX(sensor_value) AS Max_Sensor_Value FROM sensor_data
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type='Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type='Humidity' ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location, min_value, max_value FROM sensors WHERE location='Room1' ORDER BY sensor_name ASC, max_value DESC;
SELECT s.sensor_name, sd.reading_time, sd.sensor_value FROM sensors s JOIN sensor_data sd ON s.sensor_id = sd.sensor_id WHERE sd.sensor_value BETWEEN 20 and 30 ORDER BY sd.reading_time DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, AVG(sensor_value) AS average_value FROM sensors s JOIN sensor_data sd ON s.sensor_id = sd.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name HAVING AVG(sensor_value) > 25 ORDER BY average_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT location, sensor_type FROM sensors ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(sensor_id) AS total_entries FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type='TemperatureSensor';
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors WHERE status=true ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, temperature FROM sensors JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT sensor_id, location, timestamp FROM sensors JOIN maintenance_logs ON sensors.sensor_id = maintenance_logs.sensor_id WHERE description LIKE '%malfunction%';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, humidity FROM sensors JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, reading FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, AVG(reading) AS average_reading FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id HAVING AVG(reading) > 50;
SELECT device_name, location FROM device_info WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM predictive_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE reading > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM device_info WHERE last_maintenance_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT device_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_logs WHERE technician_id = 123 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_value > 100;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, installation_date FROM devices ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_description FROM predictive_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, device_id, maintenance_date, technician_name FROM maintenance_logs WHERE log_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_location DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensors WHERE sensor_value > 100;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, model FROM devices WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(sensor_id) AS total_sensors, AVG(sensor_value) AS avg_value FROM sensors GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT analysis_description, result_summary FROM predictive_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
